emotional_intensity_moderate.name: Emotional Intensity Cluster – Moderate
emotional_intensity_moderate.description: Balanced emotional regulation with occasional spikes in sensitivity.
emotional_intensity_moderate.template: You show a stable baseline, though certain interpersonal triggers may temporarily elevate your emotional response. Your core strength lies in your awareness of these shifts.
emotional_intensity_moderate.impact: Minimal on daily function, primarily affects close relationships.

high_sensitivity_avoidant.name: High Sensitivity – Avoidant Pattern
high_sensitivity_avoidant.description: High attachment sensitivity coupled with emotional withdrawal.
high_sensitivity_avoidant.template: Your internal world is rich and deeply felt, but you often find safety in distance. This protective mechanism served you once, but may now feel restrictive.
high_sensitivity_avoidant.impact: Significant impact on intimacy and social spontaneity.

analytical_controlled.name: Analytical / Controlled Pattern
analytical_controlled.description: High cognitive control with lower emotional expression.
analytical_controlled.template: You navigate the world through logic and structure. While this provides great efficiency, you may feel disconnected from your internal emotional landscape during periods of high stress.
analytical_controlled.impact: Effective in professional settings, potentially isolating in personal ones.
